start.text-description: Programmer in training, with around 7 months of experience. I am in a constant learning process, experimenting with different languages ​​and technologies. I seek challenges to improve my skills and contribute significantly to interesting projects.

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.text-aboutme1: My name is Arthur da Silva Monteiro, I'm 19 years old, have 2 dogs, and I've always been fascinated by the technological universe. My journey began at college (FAETERJ), where, in three months, I absorbed the fundamentals of programming logic. It was there that a friend recommended SERRATEC to me, where I embarked on an intensive bootcamp, dedicating four intense months that represented around 90% of my knowledge in the area.
aboutme.text-aboutme2: Now, I'm eager to apply and expand my knowledge, looking for opportunities that allow me to contribute to stimulating and constantly learning projects. With a solid foundation in programming and my dedication to the area, I seek to continually grow in the field of technology. I am open to new experiences and collaborations that can further enrich my professional career.
